response.original_title: BDSM: It's Not What You Think!
response.overview: BDSM: Itâ€™s Not What You Think! confronts stigma and stereotype surrounding kink and fetish play through leading voices within the BDSM community. With intimate interviews and playful vignettes this film targets progressive outsiders and guides them through the minefield of misconceptions and prejudice that kinksters must routinely face.
response.title: BDSM: It's Not What You Think!
